oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparison of cardiopulmonary effects of 5 degree reverse Trendelenburg and horizontal positions in dorsally recumbent sevoflurane-anesthetized calves: preliminary data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Araújo, M. J.
Deschk, M.
Wagatsuma, J. T.
Floriano, B. P.
Silva, G. L.
Santos, P. S. P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cardiopulmonary
Trendelenburg
recumbent calves
anesthesia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the study was to compare the cardiopulmonary effects of 5 degree reverse Trendelenburg (“head-up”) to the horizontal position in dorsally recumbent calves anesthetized with sevoflurane.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2014; 164-165
